Articles.Content:
Okay, so I saw this mod on CKAN once and now I can't find it.

It was like, using contracts to unlock the tech tree and basically putting science to shame in Career Mode.

Anyone help?

Thanks in advance.

I think you're talking about [Mission-Based R&D](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124326)

Most of the contract mods are listed on [Contract Configurator](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604)'s page

> 
> I think you're talking about [Mission-Based R&D](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124326)
> Most of the contract mods are listed on [Contract Configurator](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604)'s page

Ah, there it is. Thanks!
